# The Mobile Observation Ad Toolkit (MOAT)

### A Mobile App Citizen-Science Data Donation Project

_To learn more about this project, contact Dr Abdul Karim Obeid (obei@qut.edu.au)_

This project is composed of various sub-codebases that are given as follows:

* A Mobile Screen-Logging App (see `mobile_app`)
* A suite of AWS Lambda Serverless Functions (see `cloud`)
* An API to provide programmatic access to the data under JWT authentication (see `api`)
* A researcher dashboard web application to view the collected data (see `dashboard`)

These can be accessed from the relevant folders, contained at the top-level of this directory.

### [Appendix](Appendix.pdf)

This Appendix is a companion for the article *The Mobile Observation of Advertising Toolkit: A Tool for Understanding Ephemeral and Sequenced Social Media Data* by Abdul Obeid, Daniel Angus, Dang Khuong Tran, Lauren Hayden, Nicholas Carah, Khanh Luong, and Giselle Newton.

You can view the appendix using the link above, or download it using the button below.

[![Img](https://img.shields.io/badge/download-blue?style=for-the-badge&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%3D%3D&label=PDF
)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Australian-Internet-Observatory/mobile-observation-ad-toolkit/main/Appendix.pdf)
